Using \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://epa.ms/forms1\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Forms\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", you can submit a request indicating the initiative, for yourself or for a colleague. Then the badge with the points will be sent to your email.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You can check the number of points using the internal portal \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://store.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Store.epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", where the accumulated points are then exchanged for gifts. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You can find out more about the program participation from your HR contact or via email: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:WFAHRStarGameSpb@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WFAHRStarGameSpb@epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Join the StarGame program!\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rMore information you can find in the video:\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"iframe\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"//videoportal.epam.com/video/iframe.html?video=BJvwKk7R\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
